Title: Requires child restraint systems to be equipped with sensors
Summary: Requires retailers to equip child restraint systems with sensors to notify drivers if a child has been left in the car.
LawCode: Add ยง1229-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring child restraint systems to be equipped with sensor technology to alert drivers of the presence of a child
